channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: The Twelve Days of Blog-mas: No. 7 - Architecture Visuals - for Your Reference or Your Own Docs
item.description:
A softball for #7 … enjoy!
Learn from Ours: I am a visual learner - so I love these!
Browse Azure Architectures - Azure Architecture Center | Microsoft Learn High-level architecture for Microsoft Intune | Microsoft Learn Apps Workload slider in Co-management Windows 365 high-level architecture diagram | Microsoft Learn
Make Your Own: I like Visio, icons and graphics to help me make sense of things but as I peruse my own visual creations on my posts, it's clear I'm lazy and informal with how I use them. I'll grab one icon from one style, and another icon from a different style .
Azur...
